title: Managing transitions: support for individuals at key points of change [Petch, A. (Ed) (2009) Bristol: Policy Press]
abstract: This is a review of Petch's edited collection of chapters by researchers and academics arising from the collective work of Research in Practice (www.rip.org.uk) and Research in Practice for Adults (www.ripfa.org.uk): their organisational aims being to bridge the knowledge interface between researcher and practitioner
